website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 896 ver 2 has a straightforward aesthetic that doesn’t fall short with supportive benefits. It may not be fully equipped with high-performance specs, but it is well-reinforced in the right places and is stable enough on the hard court. This trainer is also one of the flexible and lightweight tennis options. It’s for the recreational players in a hunt for a quick shoe that won’t put a big dent in the wallet.
pros: Lots of reviewers feel stable wearing the New Balance 896v2 on the hard court
Many of the wearers consider it very lightweight
Most of the playtesters say it needs no break-in
This version is one of the most breathable shoes in the market, as per several users
A reasonable sum didn’t have problems with traction as the shoe provides the right amount of give
cons: The shoe tends to fit on the narrow side, according to lots of wearers
A few buyers prefer it to have more cushioning underfoot

customer_reviews.title: My Perfect Fit Pickleball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fitting tennis court shoes I’ve aver owned. Arch support is perfectly shaped for my foot and the ankle walls are stiff as they should be to provide protection from ankle twists for court use. I’m using these for daily hard court pickleball play and I have been very pleased with the comfort and support. These shoes are relatively light but plenty firm and seem like they’re constructed well enough for long lasting use.
customer_reviews.author: ProConsumerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nobody even knows...
customer_reviews.text: That these were men's tennis shoes! I bought them for the insanely good price, and I'm used to buying men stuff because I know it's probably the same product but cheaper than female. Lemme just say OMG I love the bottom of the shoe and it stops right along with me and doesn't leave any marks on the courts. Not to mention they look great with a white and black tennis outfit haha. Because of the arch I will have to buy soles for these but overall, they're great shoes. I recommend these men's one for females because men naturally have a wider foot and I do too and it's super comfy to play in them!
customer_reviews.author: lucia hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Build!
customer_reviews.text: In the past New Balance tennis shoes have always had a generous toe box, and a D width would work for me. Not so with these shoes. I exchanged a pair of Ds for EEs and they still felt a little snug, but not so tight that I couldn’t wear them. The length was good. After a few hours of use they are still snug but acceptable. Still, I knocked off one star because an EE should not feel like a smallish D. Otherwise I like these shoes. They look great, the construction is solid, they’re fairly light, and very stable. Hopefully they will wear well, but if they don’t I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So here's the problem: When I'm playing tennis and have bend my right foot quickly to chase a ball there is something in the way this shoe is made that cuts sharply into my foot. It's really quite painful and I can't find what's causing it. I should add that I also own a pair of NB 996 shoes that is remarkably more comfortable. The 996 is a soft, cushioned, stable ride. This shoe, the 886, is lighter, but it is much harder. Some people have complained about the 996 not being wide enough in the 2E size. That is not the case for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robbot

customer_reviews.title: concrete overshoes
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a pair of worn out New Balance shoes I use for tennis. Super light weight and hate to quit using them but they are just flat worn out. Ordered this pair as a replacement. Took one out of the box and discovered it is about 3 times as heavy as my current ones, so boxed them up and sent them back. I won't try to order shoes online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BSO

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, dont last long though.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are light, work great for tennis or pickleball. Buy a half size larger than normal. Colors are cool. If you play out 3 or more times a week my last pair of these lasted for 6 months before holes started to appear on the top. This pair only lasted 3.5 months before the bottoms were almost completely worn away.
customer_reviews.author: saltlick

customer_reviews.title: Must buy a half size larger and wider!
customer_reviews.text: They are much sturdier than they appear and quite comfortable and stable, but they are not sized properly. I ALWAYS wear a 10W and in these I definitely need a 10 1/2 2W. Good breathability and grip. They have turned me into a pickleball maven.
customer_reviews.author: S BLUM

customer_reviews.title: Good traction, white color looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like these shoes. They feel light and the white ones I got look pretty good. They are somewhat comfortable, not the most comfortable ones I have worn ever, but definitely not bad. They grab the floor pretty well during the game and after 4 or 5 times of playing they still work all the same. I would say get these if they are on sale again.
customer_reviews.author: Jojojoshua

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not wide even with the wide distinction
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are labeled as wide and typically the wide new balance fit my feet but these wide run very skinny. Oh and make very sure you don’t buy anything from tennis warehouse as they charge for shipping when something is too small or too big
customer_reviews.author: Frank Culver

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but too small, i am def a size 10.5 in all shoes, these were making the tops of my feet numb after 5 minutes and my toe was hitting the front. Sent back for size 11 will see how that fits, if not its too bad these shoes look cool.
customer_reviews.author: saltlick

customer_reviews.title: A little snug size 9M
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, great for Pickleball. Toe box a little snug but better with some break in .NB seems to be making most of the tennis shoes a bit smaller in the toe box. NB is still wider than some other brands. . go up 1/2 size
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - good Court Shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you play a lot of Tennis better yet Pickleball this are the shoes to get. I recommend getting a new pair every 6 months if use daily
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Pickleball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2E They work great for Pickleball All others were 2 narrow and did not have the width option available
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing new balance shoes for over 20 years. These tennis shoes definitely fit small. I normally wear 11 1/2 these were too narrow and my toes are touching the end of the shoe. Order at least a half size big if you order the shoes! I’m sure they’re good quality but they got the sizing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tennis shoes for kido and descent affordability for parents
customer_reviews.text: The pairs are for my son -- his first pair of real tennis shoes. He likes the shoes a lot. Fit well and gives him more edge when playing tennis (compared to wearing regular sneakers). So far it holds up well after 2 months of use. I'll definitely buy the same shoes after he grows out of this pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Polly_Paoli

customer_reviews.title: My tennis shoes arrived with a red shadow
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes with a slight "reddish" shadow on the front of the green sole, and it does not come out. The bad thing is that it is very difficult for me to return it, because I buy them from a PO-box in Miami, and then they send me my purchases to Medellín, Colombia. Gabriel J. Ochoa
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J. Ochoa Rios

customer_reviews.title: sizes small
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, but it sizes small. I bought a running shoe at Academy with the same size and it fits right. One size up should work
customer_reviews.author: djb

customer_reviews.title: LITTLE TO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKED THIS SHOES A LOT BUT I HAD TO RETURN CUZ THEY WERE TO NARROW. WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: DITTO

customer_reviews.title: Fit smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing them for a while; they fit too small but I expected they would stretched a bit but they did very little. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Massimo Malizia

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and color but not flexible enough
customer_reviews.text: It is too hard. My son could bend his feet much.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few weeks before writing a review. This shoes fits very well, they are flashy the orange is somewhat bright (not shiny) but vivid if you wish to call it. As for hard courts they grip very well and feel very comfortable! Will recomend for the price
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I generally buy New Balance for comfort and fit. This has not been my experience with this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: JJmimi

customer_reviews.title: Even with larger size these run small
customer_reviews.text: Order an extra size in length and ordered 2E ( wide) , and these are still tight in the toe box area . I am going to have to return these
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: 2E width is not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: The 2E width of the shoe was not wide enough for my foot. I had to return them and order a 4E in another model. The shoe was not ready to wear coming out of the box. I think it would have required 2-3 hours of break-in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might like a stiffer back end to slip foot in
customer_reviews.text: Firm fitting, hasn't stretched in 10 wearings. Very light. Might like a stiffer back end to slip foot in, but that's minor. AOK.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewersincere

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: As expected, the shoes are of great quality and fit perfectly. I like the color too. Can't beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Still Holding Up
customer_reviews.text: After 6 weeks of at least 2 hours a day/ 5 days a week of tennis, they are still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the HARDEST person to shop for shoes!! But these worked perfectly - great tennis shoe
customer_reviews.author: Cla

customer_reviews.title: What happened to New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same size of New Balance for 20 years... Ordered the same size way too small ordered half size larger way too smallgot a full size larger too small sent them all back quit trying to buy New Balance got Sketchers fit great
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for tennis
customer_reviews.text: Great for tennis. I usually wear a 9.5 in Nikes. NB I usually have to go up a half size. The 10 fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance consistently feels right! However I do prefer the 4E width over the 2E.
customer_reviews.author: Jimster

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Court Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I needed a court shoe for playing Pickleball. It is comfortable and is exactly what I needed for the courts, good looking shoe, too.
customer_reviews.author: SUM, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great support, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Solid support, great fit. Matches the color scheme on my Head Prestige Pro racquets :) New Balance are for me as they are the best option for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Relative to other brands in this category, this New Balance model last several months longer on the hardcourt before ultimately wearing through the sole to my toes
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Collier

customer_reviews.title: Just say no
customer_reviews.text: The price jumped, doubled to 110 dollars. I will never buy another NB. False advertising
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe box
customer_reviews.text: Returned, wides were quite narrow. New Balance needs to be accurate with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Al G.

customer_reviews.title: I have wide feet and a bad knee. I'm going to order more and stock up.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, very comfortable to wear on the court and off. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall, improvement over 996.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Fit is perfect, unlike previous 996. Adequate for pickleball, not as sturdy as 996. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Warner

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of NB 2E shoes before and they were perfect. Not this pair of model. They were not as wide. I felt like they were 1E or even D. I returned them. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in toe box area
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these shoes to play pickleball - never used off courts and they are less then 3 months old!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Small
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the new balance of old, the shoes always run small. And even though the returns are made easy, it's still an inconvenience to the customer. But better than getting stuck with something that your can't use.
customer_reviews.author: danielrosario

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 wide, the shoe was too tight even though it was a 13 wide. I should have tried an extra wide instead. Different styles of shoes fit differently
customer_reviews.author: Sham

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: The tennis player in my life loves these shoes. He even wears them with his jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sorrels

customer_reviews.title: easy break in - comfortable after a couple of sets ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, easy break in - comfortable after a couple of sets - using them primarily on clay courts and they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet happiness
customer_reviews.text: Great product - held up to a lot of platform tennis which eats shoes quickly. New Balance does a great job for those with wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker not sized properly
customer_reviews.text: this sneaker seems to be small I usually have no issues with 9 1⁄2 but I will return and order size 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with his shoes - happy husband makes a happy wife!
customer_reviews.author: Lyanne K N Binkauski

customer_reviews.title: Size stayed the same.  609 11.5W 3 years ago and 896 11.5W now.  Still feels good
customer_reviews.text: Got them yesterday and wore them today. 11.5W. So far so good. I had NB 609 before and these are much lighter and more snug.
customer_reviews.author: _Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable and the fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: NICE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: returned the first pair because they were too tight. second pair better but still tight. they look great.
customer_reviews.author: bob cederstrom

customer_reviews.title: The shoes have great grip. The thick sole makes them feel a ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have great grip. The thick sole makes them feel a bit stiff, but you will get use to them.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Urizar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable, light weight show that gives good support.
customer_reviews.author: bruce Brescia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe but is a little too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 896v2 Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: Stay light on your feet. The 896v2 pushes the limits of speed with a lightweight mesh FantomFit upper that allows your foot to breathe while you're reaching every shot. Underfoot the RevLite midsole offers superior comfort without sacrificing speed on top of a Data to Design driven carved out NDurance outsole to cut weight where it's not needed.
